item.description:
A Full Plate Of Spit-Roasted Rock-N-Roll

Each Bloodshot B-B-Q will have a bunch of the best bands from Bloodshot Records, buckets of razor-cold Rolling Rock and, at some of our parties, fall-off-the-bone barbecue. That, friends, is most definitely the recipe for a good time.


Middle East Downstairs

Doors at 4pm, Music 5pm
$5 Admission
21 and over

Graham Parker
Charlie Pickett
Bobby Bare Jr
Ha Ha Tonka
Deadstring Brothers

and A VERY SPECIAL SURPRISE GUEST

Free Food for the first 150 people!

My guess is that the "special guest" is one of the artists on the active Bloodshot artist page.

Details at www.bloodshotrecords.com/rollingrock
item.how_to_find_us: I will email my cell# to attendees
item.name: Bloodshot BBQ @ Middle East
